entity.script:
-- Current player playershooting = 0 -- Time since last shot time = 500 -- If true, the weapon is currently shooting shooting = false
function shoot(player) end function pickup(player) lifted:setBool(true); end function putdown(player) lifted:setBool(false); end function on_changed(property) if property:getName() == "lifted" then weapon:setVisible(not lifted:getBool()) end end function get_player_texture() return texture:getID() end
function start_shooting(player) shooting = true playershooting = player end function stop_shooting() shooting = false end
function shoot() -- Get initial bullet state local playerentity = Game.get():getEntity(playershooting) local bulletpos = playerentity:getPosition() local rotation = playerentity:getProperty("rotation"):getFloat() local speed = Vector2F(0, -1) * 5 speed:rotate(rotation) -- Create bullet local tpl = EntityTemplate.get("bullet") local bulletstate = EntityState.create(tpl) bulletstate:getProperty("start"):setVector2F(bulletpos) bulletstate:getProperty("speed"):setVector2F(speed) bulletstate:getProperty("weapon"):setUnsignedInt(this:getID()) bulletstate:getProperty("player"):setUnsignedInt(playershooting) local newbullet = Game.get():addEntity("bullet", 0, bulletstate:get()) end
function on_update() time = time + 20 if Server ~= nil and time >= 500 and shooting then shoot() time = 0 end end
-- Load texture if Client ~= nil then texture = Texture.get("sprites/plasmagun.png", false) end
